context: Digital transformation became the dominant theme in 2015 as companies accelerated cloud migration, mobile strategies, and analytics initiatives. The consulting market saw increased competition from both traditional IT services firms and emerging digital agencies. Accenture and competitors were investing heavily in acquiring digital capabilities and building cloud practices.

competitors.name: IBM Consulting
competitors.notes: Major competitor with focus on hybrid cloud and cognitive computing

competitors.name: Deloitte Digital
competitors.notes: Rapidly growing digital consulting practice within Deloitte

competitors.notes: Expanding digital and technology consulting services

competitors.notes: Growing technology and digital consulting capabilities

competitors.notes: Strong focus on digital transformation and advisory services
